titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation appointing the time when His Maiesties subiects may approach to the court, for cure of the disease, called the kings euill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Whitehall, this two and twentieth day of Aprill, in the tenth yeere of the Reigne of our Soueraigne Lord, Charles by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
